Body:
Description: Recommended configuration:
Resize Standard_D64ds_v5 to Standard_D48ds_v5Resize Standard_D64ds_v5 to Standard_D48ds_v5

Please confirm we changes has been done as recommended, will there be any impact?

What We've Learned Updated: This is pre-configured setups for VM's
They are going from an absurdly powerful one to less powerful one, that still covers all our requirements with an extra:

Standard_D64ds_v5 equals to 64 vCPUs and 256 GiB RAM.
Standard_D48ds_v5 equals to 48 vCPUs and 192 GiB RAM.
Next Steps Updated: Explain that it will work and provide infromation on requirements depending on their collectors (it's above all requirements anyway)
